telekinesis.name: telekinesis
telekinesis.desc: Get a hold on items beyond your reach.

unveil.name: unveil
unveil.desc: Uncover the true version of something.

unlock.name: unlock
unlock.desc: Allow access to things that are normally inaccessible.

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.desc: Appear at another location in the vicinity.

dash.name: dash
dash.desc: Move several tiles into a certain direction.

healing_aura.name: healing aura
healing_aura.desc: Heal everyting in a region around you.

cure.name: cure
cure.desc: Remove any effects negatively affecting your health.

deflect.name: deflect
deflect.desc: Return the next incomming hit to its origin.

charge.name: charge
charge.desc: Protect yourself from incomming hits for 3 turns.

frostbite.name: frostbite
frostbite.desc: Display a nagging cold to your opponent.

lightning.name: lightning
lightning.desc: Send out a beam of agonizing lightning.

detonate.name: detonate
detonate.desc: Create an explosion at a certain location.

wind_blast.name: wind blast
wind_blast.desc: Create strong wave of air towards an enemy.

whirlwind.name: whirlwind
whirlwind.desc: Blow every opponent surrounding you away.
